name: Splashy Hop Ball Drop
description:
Dreamed about moving ball on Drum beat? Lets enjoy the crazy ball that is jumping over the drums tha create a sweet drum beat. Drum beat is in your hand don’t allow him to fell from drum if you want to listen sweet drum voice. Each drum beat will give you the coins so start the competition with your friends and family to compete them in coins.
You are given multiple colored balls and multiple drum with hundreds of drum beats just select your desired crazy ball to move on the tricky drum path.
Features
• Start rolling the ball over drums
• Make multiple drum sounds
• Jump over as possible you can
• Get coins from each drum beat
• Collect more coins to unlock more
